short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Supplement the discourse of knowledge to virtually any website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Supverse is a beta product that is in a permanent state of change.  

Supverse, the UniVerse of WasSup, allows you to create ad hoc discussions on any page across the vast Internet. The discussion can be just a note to yourself, or a lively debate with others.  Organize all these pages and comments using personal hashtags on your Supverse profile and even stitch together these thoughts into a dynamic presentation you can share with others.  Mingle your philosophies with others in the Supverse global sensorium to create new meanings.   
		
 
- Receive personalized emails with new comments made on pages you subscribed to, without signing up.
- Sign up for a free account and use the cloud to bookmark pages and to leave notes on websites that interest you.
- Join the discussions that are ongoing, see what trends and becomes news to you, find associated information.
- Create an online dynamic stream of thought, in a Prezi like environment, and share it with like-minded people.
